title: The Unmasking
outcome: Fragments of Halden’s journal are leaked by Rada, exposing conflicting truths about his death and the BCI’s purpose. Public debate spirals, eroding trust in all factions. The Directorate pushes harsher repression and memory management as citizens challenge the system’s narrative, forcing Oksana into a desperate gamble.

events.description: Fragments of Halden's digital journal, including entries appearing after his death, are leaked anonymously onto public forums and broadcast networks.
Public debate erupts over conflicting journal entries: some portray Halden as a martyr, others as a manipulator. Trust in both Directorate and grassroots leaders collapses.
Directorate escalates memory wipe operations, targeting suspected leakers and dissidents, fueling paranoia and pushing Oksana to attempt a secret brokered truce.
Mass demonstrations and digital boycotts cripple BCI-dependent services, further undermining the Directorate’s authority and exposing their internal divisions.
Amid escalating chaos, Oksana releases her own testimony on Halden’s final days, admitting her fears of BCI autonomy and calling for a full reckoning before the entire city.
